originalText.text:
This is the second time that Bambi has helped us to find our home. In this one, she helped us to get ONE MONTH FREE of rent! Plus an amazing deal with the gorgeous building. We are extremely satisfied to work with her for 3+ years and we are looking to work with her in the future!

THANK YOU, BAMBI. You are the best!

originalText.text: Bambi was super fantastic in facilitating my NYC move. She's very on top of everything and quick with her communication!

text.text: Bambi was super fantastic in facilitating my NYC move. She's very on top of everything and quick with her communication!

originalText.text: BAMBI. Remember this name! She is not only capable of finding you the most awesome property you never knew existed, but she can get you past the gatekeepers and residing into that apartment in record pace. I selected a beachfront apartment in NYC (yes that exists!) and never thought I could live there. It took Ms. Bambi about 3 days to go from selection to APPROVED! I’m just very happy with BAMBI and if you are looking for an apartment or condo then call this lady FIRST. You will save yourself a lot of trouble by letting her work her magic for you. Your lower credit rating? Your looming divorce? Anything else?  She will overcome it. Like I say…. JUST CALL BAMBI FIRST!

originalText.text: I could never say enough good things about Bambi Blount. She went beyond the call-of-duty for me in every way. She was an ace at everything: helping me understand the NYC market, from afar, as I was living in New Orleans when I got the wonderful chance to move back to NYC; providing me all of the resources I needed to shop for the perfect place; guiding me, successfully, through the process of finding and renting my dream apartment where I now live. Moreover, she was a complete joy to work with! I have never been happier in any other place I've ever lived, and this is no exaggeration. I owe Bambi my eternal thanks!

originalText.text: Extremely satisfied with service I was provided with- golden combination of professionalism and care. Bambi is topnotch knowledgeable and reliable RE Broker with a deep respect to your time who is able to find a perfect home to match any requirements or preferences. Do yourself a favor- call her.
